abstract: The gain in inventories suggested that businesses were feeling more confident that sales would pick up.
snippet: The gain in inventories suggested that businesses were feeling more confident that sales would pick up.
lead_paragraph: Stocks advanced for a second day as technology shares climbed before Intel reported earnings. In addition, business inventories increased more than forecast, overshadowing an unexpected drop in retail sales.

headline.main: Technology Helps Lead Shares Higher as Retailers Slip
headline.print_headline: Technology Helps Lead Shares Higher as Retailers Slip
